dependent_to.description:
Gensim is a Python library for topic modelling, document indexing and
similarity retrieval with large corpora. Target audience is the natural
language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR) community.
dependent_to.name: py-gensim

description:
smart_open is a Python 2 & Python 3 library for efficient streaming of
very large files from/to S3, HDFS, WebHDFS, HTTP, or local storage. It
supports transparent, on-the-fly (de-)compression for a variety of
different formats.
name: py-smart-open

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
